tool_description: Get the latest commentary for cricket matches
name: Sports Fever
title: Sports Fever

api_list.name: GET /all-commentary-with-lang
api_list.description: Get all commentaries for a particular match

api_list.name: GET /all-commentary
api_list.description: Get all commentaries for a particular match

api_list.name: GET /match/{id}
api_list.description: Get the details of a specific match

api_list.name: GET /match
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-fever.p.rapidapi.com/api/rapidapi/match"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-fever.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
